package.name: Posixtech_NetworkMerchants
package.summary: What is “NMI Direct Post API”? The Direct Post method is the simplest integration method for both web-based and non web-based payment applications; however, merchants using this integration method should have passed a PCI vulnerability scans before use. For detail regarding this payment method, you can browse https://www.nmi.com/
package.description:
What is “NMI Direct Post API”? The Direct Post method is the simplest integration method for both web-based and non web-based payment applications; however, merchants using this integration method should have passed a PCI vulnerability scans before use. For detail regarding this payment method, you can browse https://www.nmi.com/
Network Merchants Inc (NMI) provide solution regarding payment gateways for companies that want to process online transactions in real-time anywhere in the world through unique distribution channel and power of control. The ‘First Call Resolution’, ‘Proprietary, Innovative & Secure Products’ and ‘Non-Compete Guarantee’ are key feature of NMI
This module is based on ‘Transaction Request APIs’ and has following option a. Authorize, b. Authorize & capture, c. Void d. Refund.
Customer Experience 1. Free customer support. 2. Free extension updates. 3. Free bug fixing. 4. PE compatibility 5. Easy 2-minute installation 6. All our extensions come open source 7. Free upgrades during support period 8. Our excellent support team is waiting to hear from you each business day from 9:00 am to 5:00 pm GMT Visit Extension Page: http://store.posixtech.com/nmi-direct-post-api.html User Guide: http://store.posixtech.com/nmi-direct-post-api.html Please note you must already have a Network Merchants Inc account to use this module. Please, check Magento versions compatibility on the product page!
Questions? Require customization? For any kind of question or feedback, feel free to contact us directly at info@posixtech.com
Themes and extensions releases, updates & promotions — follow Posixtech on Twitter and Facebook!
package.notes:
Compatible with magento 1.9.x and Previous version
Place order from admin panel using this payment method
